Everybody, hello.
Yesterday I had a very emotional day. I participated in the funeral ceremony of Gendarmerie Umit Akbas, who died in Van during the day.
In the evening I gave iftar for our relatives and martyrs.
Ever since I was President, I regularly made the first iftars with the families of our martyrs.
Yesterday we had 53 guests and 310 guests. I accepted all of our guests together with my wife and asked about their status and their wishes http://t.co/vjwokjhT
http://t.co/haohvxb1
We had all together iftar in the beautiful garden of the Dolmabahçe Palace. http://t.co/z1fmmqm0

Tomorrow I will be in the Iguala Lempira fulfilling our promise to the poorest. Already taking the 10mil bonus to more than 1,400 families

Ambassador Arnold Chacón informed that EE. UU It will donate US $ 200 million to support the fight against malnutrition in our country.
There is a great commitment of our part in the execution of these resources so that they are optimized and taken to the places where they are needed
The donation comes through the initiative Feeding the Future, within the Zero Hunger Pact, which includes actions in 30 municipalities.
